A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: There were a lot of plot holes and things that didn't make sense. A lot of the characters that were established in TFA were very different in this one. There were several distracting plot points that either didn't contribute to\, or took away from the bigger story. I can see where they were trying to be different but they were trying too hard and in doing so\, many of the \"new\" things just felt forced.
